hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Intraday V-Wap Fade on Low Volume
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, when PEPE or DOGE price deviates >7% from its intraday Volume-Weighted Average Price (VWAP) on spot markets with volume <70% of 10-day average, price will revert to within 3% of VWAP within the same trading day (US hours) with 65%+ probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins often experience low-volume pumps/dumps from coordinated groups. In constructive regimes, these moves lack sustainable buying; VWAP serves as natural gravity for algorithmic traders. Low volume confirms absence of institutional participation needed for trend continuation.
entry_conditions: Price >7% deviation from intraday VWAP (calculated from 9:30 ET)
Spot volume past 2 hours <70% of 10-day average for same period
No major token-related news in past 4 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 3% of intraday VWAP
exit_conditions.time_exit: End of US trading day (16:00 ET)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If price remains >5% from VWAP at day-end in >40% of instances OR average time to reversion exceeds 6 hours.
